description: Bring your websites to life with interactive JavaScript programming.

lessons.title: Introduction to JavaScript
lessons.content: Learn the basics of JavaScript and how to include it in your web pages.

lessons.title: Variables and Data Types
lessons.content: Understand JavaScript variables and data types.

lessons.title: Functions, Loops, and Conditionals
lessons.content: Master control structures in JavaScript.

lessons.title: Arrays and Objects
lessons.content: Work with arrays and objects to store and manipulate data.

lessons.title: DOM Manipulation
lessons.content: Modify HTML and CSS using the Document Object Model.

lessons.title: Events and Event Handling
lessons.content: Respond to user interactions with event handlers.

lessons.title: Form Validation
lessons.content: Validate user input in forms with JavaScript.

lessons.title: ES6 Features
lessons.content: Learn modern JavaScript features introduced in ES6.

lessons.title: LocalStorage and JSON
lessons.content: Store data locally in the browser using LocalStorage.

lessons.title: Fetch API and Async
lessons.content: Retrieve data from servers using the Fetch API.

lessons.title: Error Handling and Debugging
lessons.content: Handle errors gracefully and debug JavaScript code.

lessons.title: Mini Project: Quiz App
lessons.content: Build a complete quiz application using JavaScript.

lessons.title: ES6+ Features (Destructuring, Spread, Modules)
lessons.content: Master advanced ES6+ features for modern JavaScript development.

lessons.title: DOM Traversal & Event Delegation
lessons.content: Navigate the DOM efficiently and implement event delegation.

lessons.title: LocalStorage, SessionStorage, Cookies
lessons.content: Understand different client-side storage mechanisms.

lessons.title: API Calls with Fetch and Async/Await
lessons.content: Make asynchronous API calls with modern JavaScript techniques.

lessons.title: JSON Parsing and Manipulation
lessons.content: Work with JSON data effectively in JavaScript.

lessons.title: Classes and Object-Oriented JS
lessons.content: Implement object-oriented programming concepts in JavaScript.

lessons.title: JavaScript Modules and Imports
lessons.content: Organize code with JavaScript modules and import/export statements.

lessons.title: Error Handling and Debugging
lessons.content: Advanced techniques for handling errors and debugging JavaScript.

lessons.title: Regular Expressions (RegEx)
lessons.content: Use regular expressions for pattern matching and text manipulation.

lessons.title: Mini Project: To-Do App
lessons.content: Build a complete to-do application with advanced JavaScript features.

lessons.title: Mini Project: Calculator
lessons.content: Create a functional calculator using JavaScript.

lessons.title: Mini Project: Quiz App
lessons.content: Enhance the quiz app with advanced JavaScript features.

lessons.title: Mini Project: Weather App (Fetch API demo)
lessons.content: Build a weather application that fetches real data from an API.

lessons.title: Closures, Hoisting, and Scope
lessons.content: Understand advanced JavaScript concepts like closures, variable hoisting, and scope chains.

lessons.title: Promises and Async/Await (Deep Dive)
lessons.content: Master asynchronous JavaScript with a deep dive into Promises and async/await patterns.

lessons.title: Event Loop and Execution Context
lessons.content: Learn how JavaScript's event loop and execution context work to handle asynchronous operations.

lessons.title: Modules and Imports/Exports
lessons.content: Organize your codebase using JavaScript modules with import/export syntax for better maintainability.

lessons.title: DOM Traversal and Mutation Observer
lessons.content: Navigate the DOM efficiently and use MutationObserver to watch for DOM changes.

lessons.title: Debouncing & Throttling
lessons.content: Implement performance optimization techniques like debouncing and throttling for event handlers.

lessons.title: Custom Events
lessons.content: Create and dispatch custom events for better component communication in your applications.

lessons.title: Error Handling with Try/Catch
lessons.content: Implement robust error handling strategies using try/catch blocks and error objects.

lessons.title: Using APIs (OpenWeather, GitHub, JSONPlaceholder)
lessons.content: Work with real-world APIs to fetch and manipulate data in your JavaScript applications.

lessons.title: Mini Project: Weather Dashboard
lessons.content: Build a weather dashboard that fetches data from a real API and displays it with dynamic UI updates.

lessons.title: Mini Project: To-Do Manager
lessons.content: Create an advanced to-do manager with categories, due dates, and local storage persistence.

lessons.title: Mini Project: Memory Game
lessons.content: Develop a complete memory card matching game with animations, scoring, and game state management.

questions.question: Which keyword is used to declare a variable in JavaScript?
How do you write 'Hello World' in an alert box?
How do you create a function in JavaScript?
